overview: Troubled magic shop employee Zuma has a chance encounter with an unusually tiny mystical dragon.  This little lizard is cute and all, but it may be causing more grief than our already angsty protagonist can handle.  When a mind-bending malevolent force breaks free from its life of confinement on store shelves, however, the pocket-sized dragon may be the support that Zuma needs to overcome his inner demons.
title: Pocket Dragon
